name: Lite-details
description:
As a site administrator
I want to be able to set "lite details" mode on a site
So that details pages for non-SEO customers will take fewer resources and be more performant
because JCR nodes are not created for each details page.

elements.name: Details page when lite-details is enabled

steps.name: I make a new site "lite-details"
I go to "/admin/searchadmin/$site"
I check the checkbox "Lite Details Mode"
I click the button "Save Settings"
I go to "/admin/data/$site"
I upload the file "testtheme.csv"
I request a lite details page for id "t11"
I should be on the details page
the page should contain the text "Test ATM"

elements.name: Not found page when lite-details is disabled

steps.name: I make a new site "lite-details-off"
I go to "/admin/data/$site"
I upload the file "testtheme.csv"
I request a lite details page for id "t11"
the page should contain the text "Page Not Found"
